title: invoxia NVX 200 turns mobile into a corded telephone for the office
text:
invoxia NVX 200 turns mobile into a corded telephone for the office jan 15, 2017 invoxia NVX 200 turns mobile into a corded telephone for the office 

invoxia, the french company specializing in connected objects for communication, is widening its range of connected phones for the office with ‘NVX 200′, an accessory thought to gather the instant communication of the smartphone and combine it with the best of desktop corded telephones. today, 63% of the companies are equipped with a mobile versus only 16% in 2009. in a time where the use of mobile tech for professional purpose is more and more frequent, ‘NVX 200′ is a hardware solution that optimizes and completes smartphone functionality by bringing comfort, quality and simplicity of use in a professional mode. 


invoxia ‘NVX 200′ is compatible with all bluetooth smartphones with micro-USB port and all ‘ iPhone ‘ models. no application is required and a bluetooth connection is sufficient for an optimal connection. 

‘the sector of IOT has achieved a certain maturity. a kind of gadget era that tends towards products that truly help people in their daily lives. the connected object itself has to express an obvious usage. the role of design is central in the pedagogy of an innovative connected object, technology alone does not suffice,’ comments pierre garder, cofounder of paris-based eliumstudio , the industrial-design company behind the smart-telephone-adapter. 


users can also benefit from invoxia’s technology in ‘vivo acoustic’ for use in bluetooth speaker or make calls in hands-free calls with the smart-telephone-adapter from up to 5 meters / 16 feet away, representing a very competitive price comparing to other existing conference systems, with clearer sound quality. 


‘NVX 200′ is easy to set-up in the office: it doesn’t require a smartphone app, it does not need any ethernet or wi-fi connectivity on the desk. simply plug in the power supply and the device is fully operational. invoxia also offers operators and voice over internet protocol (VOIP) telephone integrators, such as skype , an SDK ( iOS and android ), allowing them to integrate the ‘NVX 200′ to their VOIP mobile apps. this way, ‘NVX 200′ becomes the ideal partner to mobile VOIP at the office by enabling direct access to dialing, the daily call log, plus the address book of the app.
